Value object to specify download target

コンストラクタの詳細

DownloadInfo

public DownloadInfo(java.lang.String remotePath,
                    java.lang.String localPath,
                    Bundle extra)
パラメータ:
remotePath - Path to remote file
localPath - Path to local file
extra - Extra which broadcast with Downloader.ACTION_DOWNLOADED etc

DownloadInfo

public DownloadInfo(java.lang.String remotePath,
                    java.lang.String localPath,
                    Bundle extra,
                    long estimatedSize)
パラメータ:
remotePath - Path to remote file
localPath - Path to local file
extra - Extra which broadcast with Downloader.ACTION_DOWNLOADED etc
estimatedSize - Use for notification progress bar calculation (currently not used)
